lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Scores of such products are already on the market, but most are specialty items, such as Lotus Development Corp's <LOTS> CD-ROM data base of stock information for financial analysts and investors.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Regardless of the specific application, the trend is toward converting information - documents, video or film or even sound recordings - into to the digital language of zeros and ones understood by computers.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "This flurry of new technology could yield systems that handle a multimedia blitz of data," said Ian Warhaftig, a senior analyst with International Data Corp, Framingham, Mass.
